name: Complete App Launcher Suite
description: A comprehensive hierarchical app launcher for all your applications, organized by category with intuitive keyboard shortcuts.
author: SwiftKey
content:
# Comprehensive app launcher organized by category
- key: "a"
  icon: "app.badge"
  title: "Applications"
  submenu:
    - key: "p"
      icon: "briefcase"
      title: "Productivity"
      submenu:
        - key: "n"
          title: "Notion"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Notion.app"
        - key: "o"
          title: "Obsidian"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Obsidian.app"
        - key: "t"
          title: "Things"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Things3.app"
        - key: "2"
          title: "Todoist"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Todoist.app"
        - key: "r"
          title: "RoamResearch"
          action: "open://https://roamresearch.com"
        - key: "e"
          title: "Evernote"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Evernote.app"
    - key: "d"
      icon: "hammer.fill"
      title: "Development"
      submenu:
        - key: "v"
          title: "Visual Studio Code"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Visual Studio Code.app"
        - key: "x"
          title: "Xcode"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Xcode.app"
        - key: "i"
          title: "IntelliJ IDEA"
          action: "launch:///Applications/IntelliJ IDEA.app"
        - key: "p"
          title: "PyCharm"
          action: "launch:///Applications/PyCharm.app"
        - key: "a"
          title: "Android Studio"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Android Studio.app"
        - key: "t"
          title: "Terminal"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Utilities/Terminal.app"
        - key: "w"
          title: "Warp"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Warp.app"
        - key: "k"
          title: "iTerm"
          action: "launch:///Applications/iTerm.app"
        - key: "d"
          title: "Docker Desktop"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Docker.app"
        - key: "p"
          title: "Postman"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Postman.app"
    - key: "c"
      icon: "message.fill"
      title: "Communication"
      submenu:
        - key: "s"
          title: "Slack"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Slack.app"
        - key: "d"
          title: "Discord"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Discord.app"
        - key: "z"
          title: "Zoom"
          action: "launch:///Applications/zoom.us.app"
        - key: "t"
          title: "Teams"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Microsoft Teams (work or school).app"
        - key: "m"
          title: "Mail"
          action: "launch:///System/Applications/Mail.app"
        - key: "g"
          title: "Gmail"
          action: "open://https://mail.google.com"
    - key: "b"
      icon: "safari"
      title: "Browsers"
      submenu:
        - key: "s"
          title: "Safari"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Safari.app"
        - key: "c"
          title: "Chrome"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Google Chrome.app"
        - key: "f"
          title: "Firefox"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Firefox.app"
        - key: "a"
          title: "Arc"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Arc.app"
        - key: "e"
          title: "Edge"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Microsoft Edge.app"
        - key: "b"
          title: "Brave"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Brave Browser.app"
    - key: "m"
      icon: "music.note"
      title: "Media"
      submenu:
        - key: "s"
          title: "Spotify"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Spotify.app"
        - key: "a"
          title: "Apple Music"
          action: "launch:///System/Applications/Music.app"
        - key: "n"
          title: "Netflix"
          action: "open://https://netflix.com"
        - key: "y"
          title: "YouTube"
          action: "open://https://youtube.com"
        - key: "p"
          title: "Photos"
          action: "launch:///System/Applications/Photos.app"
        - key: "q"
          title: "QuickTime"
          action: "launch:///System/Applications/QuickTime Player.app"
    - key: "u"
      icon: "wrench.and.screwdriver"
      title: "Utilities"
      submenu:
        - key: "f"
          title: "Finder"
          action: "launch:///System/Library/CoreServices/Finder.app"
        - key: "a"
          title: "Activity Monitor"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Utilities/Activity Monitor.app"
        - key: "k"
          title: "Disk Utility"
          action: "launch:///Applications/Utilities/Disk Utility.app"
        - key: "s"
          title: "System Settings"
          action: "launch:///System/Applications/System Settings.app"
        - key: "c"
          title: "Calculator"
          action: "launch:///System/Applications/Calculator.app"
        - key: "n"
          title: "Notes"
          action: "launch:///System/Applications/Notes.app"

name: Quick App Launcher
description: A streamlined launcher for your most frequently used applications, designed for efficiency and quick access.
author: SwiftKey
content:
# Quick launcher for most used applications
- key: "q"
  icon: "bolt.fill"
  title: "Quick Launch"
  submenu:
    - key: "s"
      icon: "doc.text"
      title: "Slack"
      action: "launch:///Applications/Slack.app"
    - key: "c"
      icon: "safari"
      title: "Chrome"
      action: "launch:///Applications/Google Chrome.app"
    - key: "v"
      icon: "chevron.left.forwardslash.chevron.right"
      title: "VS Code"
      action: "launch:///Applications/Visual Studio Code.app"
    - key: "n"
      icon: "note.text"
      title: "Notion"
      action: "launch:///Applications/Notion.app"
    - key: "m"
      icon: "envelope"
      title: "Mail"
      action: "launch:///System/Applications/Mail.app"
    - key: "t"
      icon: "terminal"
      title: "Terminal"
      action: "launch:///Applications/Utilities/Terminal.app"
    - key: "w"
      icon: "target"
      title: "Warp"
      action: "launch:///Applications/Warp.app"
    - key: "f"
      icon: "folder"
      title: "Finder"
      action: "launch:///System/Library/CoreServices/Finder.app"
    - key: "z"
      icon: "video"
      title: "Zoom"
      action: "launch:///Applications/zoom.us.app"
    - key: "p"
      icon: "photo"
      title: "Photos"
      action: "launch:///System/Applications/Photos.app"

name: Workflow App Launcher
description: Launch application sets based on different workflows and project types, helping you quickly set up your workspace for specific tasks.
author: SwiftKey

name: Developer Bookmarks Collection
description: A comprehensive collection of developer resources, documentation, tools, and community sites, organized by category for easy access.
author: SwiftKey
content:
# Developer web resources and documentation
- key: "d"
  icon: "chevron.left.forwardslash.chevron.right"
  title: "Dev Resources"
  submenu:
    - key: "d"
      icon: "doc.text"
      title: "Documentation"
      submenu:
        - key: "m"
          title: "MDN Web Docs"
          action: "open://https://developer.mozilla.org"
        - key: "r"
          title: "React Docs"
          action: "open://https://react.dev/reference/react"
        - key: "n"
          title: "Node.js Docs"
          action: "open://https://nodejs.org/en/docs"

          title: "Python Docs"
          action: "open://https://docs.python.org"
        - key: "s"

          action: "open://https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swift"

          title: "Go Docs"
          action: "open://https://golang.org/doc"
    - key: "t"

      title: "Tools & Utilities"
      submenu:

          title: "JSON Formatter"
          action: "open://https://jsonformatter.org"

name: Raycast Window Management
description: A collection of Raycast URL scheme shortcuts for managing windows on macOS, including positioning, resizing, and arranging windows.
author: SwiftKey
content:
# Raycast window management shortcuts
- key: "w"
  icon: "rectangle.3.group"
  title: "Window Management"
  submenu:
    - key: "l"
      icon: "rectangle.lefthalf"
      title: "Left Half"
      action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/window-management/left-half"
      notify: true
    - key: "r"
      icon: "rectangle.righthalf"
      title: "Right Half"
      action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/window-management/right-half"
      notify: true
    - key: "t"
      icon: "rectangle.tophalf"
      title: "Top Half"
      action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/window-management/top-half"
      notify: true
    - key: "b"
      icon: "rectangle.bottomhalf"
      title: "Bottom Half"
      action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/window-management/bottom-half"
      notify: true
    - key: "f"
      icon: "rectangle"
      title: "Maximize"
      action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/window-management/maximize"
      notify: true
    - key: "c"
      icon: "dot.square"
      title: "Center"
      action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/window-management/center"
      notify: true
    - key: "q"
      icon: "square.grid.2x2"
      title: "Quarters"
      submenu:
        - key: "1"
          title: "First Quarter"
          action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/window-management/first-quarter"
          notify: true
        - key: "2"
          title: "Second Quarter"
          action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/window-management/second-quarter"
          notify: true
        - key: "3"
          title: "Third Quarter"
          action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/window-management/third-quarter"
          notify: true
        - key: "4"
          title: "Fourth Quarter"
          action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/window-management/fourth-quarter"
          notify: true
    - key: "d"
      icon: "square.grid.3x2"
      title: "Display"
      submenu:
        - key: "n"
          title: "Next Display"
          action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/window-management/next-display"
          notify: true
        - key: "p"
          title: "Previous Display"
          action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/window-management/previous-display"
          notify: true
    - key: "s"
      icon: "arrow.up.left.and.arrow.down.right"
      title: "Size"
      submenu:
        - key: "l"
          title: "Larger"
          action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/window-management/larger"
          notify: true
        - key: "s"
          title: "Smaller"
          action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/window-management/smaller"
          notify: true

name: Raycast System Utilities
description: A collection of Raycast URL scheme shortcuts for controlling macOS system features, including display, audio, power management, and more.
author: SwiftKey
content:
# Raycast system utility shortcuts
- key: "s"
  icon: "gearshape.fill"
  title: "System Controls"
  submenu:
    - key: "d"
      icon: "display"
      title: "Display"
      submenu:
        - key: "b"
          title: "Toggle Dark Mode"
          action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/system/toggle-dark-mode"
          notify: true
        - key: "f"
          title: "Toggle Do Not Disturb"
          action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/system/toggle-do-not-disturb"
          notify: true
        - key: "n"
          title: "Toggle Night Shift"
          action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/system/toggle-night-shift"
          notify: true
        - key: "s"
          title: "Toggle Screen Saver"
          action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/system/toggle-screen-saver"
          notify: true
        - key: "h"
          title: "Hide Desktop Icons"
          action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/system/toggle-desktop-icons"
          notify: true
    - key: "a"
      icon: "speaker.wave.3"
      title: "Audio"
      submenu:
        - key: "m"
          title: "Mute"
          action: "open://raycast://extensions/raycast/system/toggle-mute"
          notify: true

name: Raycast Productivity Tools

name: Raycast Developer Tools

# Raycast developer tool shortcuts
- key: "d"
